creator: dastardly740@yahoo.com
text:
Probably the best way to duplicate this is the following:  

1) Create a list with an item-label
2) Create an item body that starts with an external graphic and may have some
text afterwards.
3) Repeat until a page break occurs.

You shoudl end up with the item-label on one page and a graphic on the next for
the list-item that forces the pagebreak.

creator: vhennebert@gmail.com
text: Fixed in FOP 0.94 (and probably earlier versions down to 0.90 beta).
batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
creator: gadams@apache.org
